title: 113-1學年體育館每週一至五中午12：00-14：00開放租借使用公告113-1 School year gymnasium is open for rental every Monday to Friday from 12:00 to 14:00 noon.

標題： 113-1學年體育館每週一至五中午12：00-14：00開放租借使用公告113-1 School year gymnasium is open for rental every Monday to Friday from 12:00 to 14:00 noon.
日期： Fri, 6 Sep 2024 17:31:54 +0800

一、自113-1學年開始體育館每週一至五(除國定假日、學校行事曆休假日外)中午12：00-14：00開放租借用。
二、依據體育館收費標準計費。教職員生羽球場地(50元/時)、籃球場地(200元/時)。
三、體育館場地借用預借7天後場地可至體育中心網頁https://pec.ndhu.edu.tw/ (運動場館/運動場借用系統)登入、前6天或當天借用者可至體育館器材室借用繳費登記借用。
四、器材之借用請攜帶學生證、健保卡、身份證至器材室辦理。
1. Starting from the 113-1 school year, the gymnasium will be open for rent every Monday to Friday (except national holidays and school calendar holidays) from 12:00 to 14:00 noon.
2. Charges will be based on gymnasium charging standards. Badminton court for staff and students (50 yuan/hour), basketball court (200 yuan/hour).
3. For borrowing the gymnasium venue, you can log in to the sports center website https://pec.ndhu.edu.tw/ (Sports Venue/Sports Ground Borrowing System) after 7 days of advance borrowing. Those who borrow the venue for the first 6 days or on the same day can go to the gymnasium equipment room to borrow it. Pay registration to borrow.
4. To borrow equipment, please bring your student ID card, health insurance card, and ID card to the equipment room.
